head.supplied: March 11 [186]3 ¶ [Letter includes:] Society will avail itself of his kindness and propose putting 20 English Perch in the Middle Gully Resevoir:] These fish are now under the care of Dr Mueller who i...

div.p: No. 63/324, p. 423, unit 2, VPRS 2225, Zoological Acclimatisation Society of Victoria, outwards correspondence book 1862-3, Public Record Office, Victoria.

To proof.
Dixon, Engineer-in-charge, Woodend, Vic. March 11 [186]3

[Letter includes:] Society will avail itself of his kindness and propose putting 20 English Perch in the Middle Gully Resevoir:] These fish are now under the care of Dr Mueller who is from town but on his return I will inform you when they will be ready and they will be placed in your possession in Melbourne for conveyance to Woodend.
